name: banka
description: Banka is a light-weight core banking application that powers banking operations like account creation, customer deposit and withdrawals. This app is meant to support a single bank, where users can signup and create bank accounts online, but must visit the branch to withdraw or deposit money

scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run build-app && npm run start
scripts.coveralls: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.test: mocha --recursive --require @babel/register --require @babel/polyfill test/User/signIn.js test/User/signUp.js test/User/createBankAccounts.js test/Staff/debitAccounts.js test/Staff/creditAccounts.js test/Admin/toggleAccount.js test/Admin/deleteAccount.js --exit
